text:
I have tried sending continuous packets on the port where httpd server was listening. However,have observed that ,on every 3 to 5 mins,Apache threads restarts when continuous loads of packets on the port where Apache is listening .


Please help me with this one 

Thanks
creator: raj.kiran@tayana.in

text: I'd suggest taking this to users@httpd.apache.org until there is something more concrete to report in bugzilla.
